title: Moda Center
summary: Moda Center, formerly known as the Rose Garden, is the primary indoor sports arena in Portland, Oregon, United States. It is used for basketball, ice hockey, rodeos, circuses, conventions, ice shows, concerts, and dramatic productions. The arena has a capacity of 19,393Â spectators when configured for basketball.[2]  It is equipped with state-of-the-art acoustics and other amenities.[8]
